Others: 22-year-old pacer Mayank Yadav is all certain to make his debut for Team India at some point of time in the series against Bangladesh, in the absence of regular names like Jasprit Bumrah and Mohammed Siraj.
Mayank Yadav impressed for Lucknow Super Giants in just four games in the IPL, becoming the second-fastest Indian bowler ever as he clocked a speed of 156.7 kmph and picked up 7 wickets.
